title: Critical Exception Processing Transaction

@realsnick is this with --Xbonsai-use-snapshots=true ? if so - recommend setting --Xbonsai-use-snapshots=false in your config - this feature is still early access so there is some instability there
not sure, i use ethd to run and configure it. I'll check
thanks for following this up @realsnick - would be great to get the default setup sorted for this in eth-docker

@macfarla the PR was accepted with changing the `Xbonsai-use-snapshots=false`

Though the `sync-mode` left unchanged and it is `X_SNAP`. Is it ok or is it considered alpha as well and should be defaulted to `X_CHECKPOINT`?
@realsnick technically SNAP and CHECKPOINT are both "early access" but SNAP has been around longer.
